title: Imported Prosciutto Products (Listeria)
summary: WASHINGTON, May 5, 2010 - International Gourmet, a Springfield, Va., establishment, is recalling approximately 70 pounds of prosciutto products that may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The problem was discovered by FSIS...
impacted_products: Various weight cases of "CASA ITALIA C.I. PROSCIUTTO BONELESS"
